Edit 2: Comment cleared out because people like to judge without hearing my side of the argument.
even without hextech crafting, you would still have a lot of ip, so i dont understand how your abundance of ip relates to hextech...

@Busty Demoness; So...your whole thing is about a sub 50% chance to get something that you can't use. I've go this right so far? Okay, good. So...you're complaining because YOU can't use something that literal MILLIONS of other people can use. Who the actual f*** do you think you are? The center of the universe? Why do you feel that Riot should change something that works for everyone else, just because it doesn't work for you? Riot is already GIVING you a chance to earn skins for free. 

Removing the champ shards increases the amount of skins you get for free, which in turn forces them to lose more money. What makes you so damn important that you feel like they should ruin some of their profits, which in turn lowers the amount of money that they have for payroll?

What makes you so special that you can't be bothered to deal with champ shards like the rest of us? Why the h*** do you feel so damn entitled to a reward of some kind? You remember what we had before hextech? Nothing. Absolutely nothing. You remember how we got free skins? By way of Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube, as well as the old reference system (which didn't really work out), end-of-season rewards for gold+ players, and a few other outliers. How many skins is that total? Let's see....3 for social media(and youtube), 2 for references, UFO Corki for making account prior to Jan 2010, Triumphant Ryze tournament skin, King Rammus (CBT), Judgement Kayle, PAX TF/Jax/Sivir, Riot squad Singed, and Championship Riven. I may have missed a couple, but I don't think so.

That's a whopping 14. Out of hundreds. And you could only get some of them under special circumstances, and would have to have an account from CBT in order to possibly have all of them. Fourteen skins given away for free pre-Hextech. And now they give away hundreds upon hundreds. Some expensive, some cheap, but all still free. And you're complaining about getting some bad luck. Talk about a selfish, self-entitled, whiny brat.

@Busty Demoness The point of the game isn't to give you free shit, it's to allow you to have fun. The free shit is just a side bonus. Yes, it is a little useless if you own every champion and obtain a champion shard. That's what you get for grinding the shit out of everything with an MMO mindset and blowing through all the extra benefits of playing the game for the purpose of having fun. There's no point in complaining about getting free stuff you can't use because it's not hurting you, you're just being egocentric and demanding that you, part of "the 1%", get special attention seperate from the rest of us. I have been playing League since the first ranked season (2011) around the time Nocturne was released. You're completely right by saying that we cheer on Riot because it's free. Because we have no reason to complain because it's free. It's fucking free so we don't complain. There is no downside. Shut up and have fun with the game like you're supposed to and stop bitching about the small things you don't like.

I think there's a difference between not liking what you got for FREE cause it's "useless", and then complaining what you got for FREE and wanting something else.  You ever been in costco? They give out free samples. If they were giving out a taste of cheese and I was lactose intolerant, should I be throwing a fit about how they should give me a free hotdog instead?!? NO! I just move on and look for the other samples lol

So being able to disenchant a Champion Shard for Blue Essence that you can use to upgrade your champions to level 6 or 7 is useless? And also, you can spend freely earned IP on Champion Shards, they're in the shop for 1700, so go spend away. Not everyone in this game is as far along as you are. You've capped off for champs and what not. Using chests is a gamble in the first place. Why would Riot, a company that has employees that they have to pay and want to still make a profit afterwards, make something for cheap, or free because of your _unreasonable amount of IP_, that can easily get you skins that normally cost money? It just doesn't make sense in any regard. If you're gonna complain about it because it's useless, just don't do it. You play this game on your own time
